data.name: Verto Studio VR Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo includes a powerful subset of the features of Verto Studio VR, including access to VR 3D modeling, desktop mode (no VR headset required), and many other pro modeling features.
data.about_the_game: This demo includes a powerful subset of the features of Verto Studio VR, including access to VR 3D modeling, desktop mode (no VR headset required), and many other pro modeling features.
data.short_description: This demo includes a powerful subset of the features of Verto Studio VR, including access to VR 3D modeling, desktop mode (no VR headset required), and many other pro modeling features.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 x64 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 equivalent

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
